p: After root trait quantification, roots and shoots were dried at room temperature in brown paper bags for two days. After drying, the bags were placed in a drying oven (Quincy lab. INC, Fisher Scientific, USA) at 75 °C for 48 h, and dry mass was measured using an analytical balance (Accuris Dx W3101A-220, Mid Sci, Valley Park, MO, USA).
